title: Can Elon Musk Make the Math Work on Owning Twitter? It’s Dicey.
description: Mr. Musk faces financial challenges in owning Twitter. The site frequently loses money and took on $13 billion in debt for the blockbuster deal.
dc:creator: Lauren Hirsch
media:description: Twitter’s headquarters in San Francisco. Elon Musk’s ability to make the numbers work will have a direct impact on the social media company’s health.
